name: SemanticPromptGuardrail
description: Validate the request content by checking its semantic similarity against a list of defined allowed and denied prompts.

policyAttributes.name: name
policyAttributes.description: The name of the guardrail policy. This will be used for tracking purposes.

policyAttributes.name: rules
policyAttributes.description: Define the allowed and denied prompts.

policyAttributes.name: threshold
policyAttributes.description: The similarity threshold that must be met for rule enforcement.

policyAttributes.name: jsonPath
policyAttributes.description: The JSONPath expression used to extract content from the payload. If not specified, the entire payload will be used for validation.

policyAttributes.name: hideAssessment
policyAttributes.description: When enabled, the error response will omit detailed information about the reason for the guardrail intervention.
